channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Watch Bruce Springsteen, Steven Van Zandt Perform ‘Tenth Avenue Freeze-Out’ at the Stone Pony
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends unite! Bruce Springsteen and Steven Van Zandt bring down the house at Stone Pony with 'Tenth Avenue Freeze-Out'! 🎶 #BossVibes

item.title: Joe Jonas Humorously Responds to Backlash Over Jonas Brothers’ World Series Performance
item.description: 🎤 Joe Jonas hits a home run with his witty comeback to critics! ⚾️🤣 #JonasBrothers #WorldSeriesFun

item.title: Dijon Performs All Of Baby At San Diego Tour Opener
item.description: 🎶 Dijon kicks off tour with a bang in San Diego, playing all of 'Baby' live! Who else is feeling the good vibes? 🙌 #DijonLiveInSD

item.title: Fans Choose LE SSERAFIM & J-Hope’s ‘Spaghetti’ as This Week’s Favorite New Music
item.description: 🍝 Join the fun and groove to LE SSERAFIM & J-Hope's 'Spaghetti' - the ultimate fan favorite this week! 🎶 #NewMusicDiscovery

item.title: Watch Daft Punk’s Thomas Bangalter Join Fred Again.. for First DJ Set in 16 Years
item.description: 🎶 Daft Punk's Thomas Bangalter back in action with Fred Again.. for epic DJ set after 16 years! Let's dance! 💃🕺 #DaftPunk #ThomasBangalter #FredAgain
